_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
an8.86:3.1+an8.86:3.7^who_else_mentioned: the Blessed One, the Holy One, Buddha
an8.86:1.4+an8.86:1.7: brahmins of Icchānaṅgala, householders of Icchānaṅgala
before^an8.86:4.1^who_around: a large Saṅgha of mendicants, Nāgita
before^an8.86:4.1^where: the land of the Kosalans, Icchānaṅgala, a forest near Icchānaṅgala
where: the land of the Kosalans, Icchānaṅgala, a forest near Icchānaṅgala
